stance_1: Eating meat is a habit for me
justification: The interviewee explicitly states eating meat is habitual and that they eat meat regularly; these stances directly reinforce each other.

stance_1: Family members eat any kind of meat
stance_2: Most people I spend time with eat chicken

stance_2: Most people I spend time with eat chicken

The interviewee says that they would consider non-meat options if they were less expensive, implying cost helps maintain their regular meat eating.
Both pork and red meat are mentioned as causing stomach discomfort, reinforcing each other as reasons for avoidance.
